About Le Madras

Welcome to Restaurant Le Madras. We serve authentic Indian and Pakistani food. We have a daily mouth-watering lunch buffet and a extensive menu for our A-la-carte Dinner.

Restaurant Le Madras features distinctive regional Indian and Pakistani cuisine, critically acclaimed for its distinct flavors and a mastery of tandoor cooking - from traditional breads to vegetable specialties and aromatic curries, to signature tandoor-grilled meats and seafood. Come dine with us either for lunch or dinner that reflect the tastes of India. We look forward to welcoming you at Restaurant Le Madras.
